# FitPulse: Health Anomaly Detection from Fitness Devices

##  Overview

*FitPulse* is a data analytics and machine learning project designed to detect health anomalies from time-series data generated by wearable fitness devices such as *Fitbit, Apple Watch, and other wearables*. These devices continuously collect biometric and activity-related data that can reveal early warning signs of potential health issues.

This project leverages *time-series analysis, statistical feature extraction, and anomaly detection techniques* to automatically identify unusual health patterns and present meaningful insights through a visualization dashboard. The system aims to support *preventive healthcare, wellness monitoring, and data-driven lifestyle decisions*.

---

##  Objectives

- Detect anomalies in wearable health data using analytical and machine learning techniques  
- Identify irregular health patterns at an early stage  
- Provide interpretable insights for improved wellness monitoring  
- Support personalized and preventive healthcare decision-making  

---

##  Key Features

-  *Data Import*
  - Supports CSV and JSON fitness tracking data
  - Compatible with common wearable device exports  

-  *Data Cleaning & Preprocessing*
  - Handles missing values and inconsistent timestamps
  - Normalizes and smooths noisy time-series data  

-  *Feature Engineering*
  - Statistical features (mean, variance, rolling statistics)
  - Trend and seasonality detection
  - Time-based aggregations  

-  *Anomaly Detection*
  - Threshold-based metric violations
  - Forecasting model residual analysis
  - Clustering-based outlier detection  

-  *Visualization Dashboard*
  - Health trend visualization
  - Highlighted anomaly periods
  - Metric filtering and time-range selection  

-  *Reporting*
  - Export anomaly summaries and insights
  - Supports health trend reports  

---

##  Dataset

The project uses a simulated wearable fitness dataset with missing values to reflect real-world conditions.

 *Dataset File:*  
[Fitness_Health_Tracking_Dataset_with_Missing_Values.csv](https://github.com/Pujitha2016/FitPulse-Health-Anomaly-Detection-from-Fitness-Devices/blob/main/Fitness_Health_Tracking_Dataset_with_Missing_Values.csv)

### Sample Metrics Included:
- Heart Rate  
- Step Count  
- Sleep Duration  
- Physical Activity Levels  

---

##  Technology Stack

- *Programming Language:* Python  
- *Data Processing:* Pandas, NumPy  
- *Visualization:* Matplotlib, Seaborn / Plotly  
- *Machine Learning:* Scikit-learn  
- *Time-Series Analysis:* Statistical & forecasting techniques  
- *Dashboard (Optional):* Streamlit / Dash  

---

##  Project Workflow

1. Load wearable health data  
2. Clean and preprocess time-series data  
3. Extract statistical and temporal features  
4. Apply anomaly detection models  
5. Visualize health trends and anomalies  
6. Generate insights and reports  

---

##  Use Cases

- Early detection of abnormal heart rate or sleep patterns  
- Continuous wellness monitoring  
- Lifestyle and fitness optimization  
- Preventive and personalized healthcare support  

---

##  Future Enhancements

- Real-time wearable device integration  
- Deep learning models (LSTM, Autoencoders)  
- Personalized baseline modeling per user  
- Real-time anomaly alert system  

---
